allow:
Bash(git -C /c/dev/dion.coach commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix navbar: restore dion.coach menu accidentally replaced by trading project

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git -C /c/dev/dion.coach add public/pages/contact.php public/pages/apropos.php public/pages/nouvelles.php public/pages/dashboard.php public/pages/verify-email-required.php docs/ARCHITECTURE.md)

Bash(git -C /c/dev/dion.coach commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix mobile hamburger menu: re-enable footer.php \(Bootstrap JS\) on all pages

Also add architecture documentation.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /c/dev/dion.coach commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add collapsible categories with avg and completion status in eval grid

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
